aleph.trans
Class SimpleTransactionManager

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--aleph.trans.TransactionManager
        |
        +--aleph.trans.SimpleTransactionManager
public class SimpleTransactionManager
extends TransactionManager

Simple Transaction Manager. Placeholder until we get a real transaction manager. Currently supports transactions only within a single PE.
